system.description:
Rajraya Pintas' greatest student, Ilakat Salandra, was said to have perfected what the Rajaraya could not in the beginning: she perfected the form of being one with your warband, coordination and cooperation with one another. They moved as one, and she became the warband's burning spirit, one with Nihawa.

Spend 1 Beat to give BRV Up (2) to yourself or a single ally in range 3.

Spend 2 Beats to give BRV Up (2) to yourself and all allies in burst 3.

Spend 3 Beats to give yourself and all allies in the battlefield +1 to BRV until the end of Violence.
